revision.text:
[[File:MoonStone.jpg|thumb|200px|The Moon Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Moon Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Saffron City]] in [[Kanto]] and [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Fallarbor Town]] in [[Hoenn]]. It can also be mined from the [[Underground]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy || [[File:Clefable.png|40px]] Clefable |- | [[File:Jigglypuff.png|40px]] Jigglypuff || [[File:Wigglytuff.png|40px]] Wigglytuff |- | [[File:Nidorina30.png|40px]] Nidorina || [[File:Nidoqueen.png|40px]] Nidoqueen |- | [[File:Nidorino.png|40px]] Nidorino || [[File:Nidoking.png|40px]] Nidoking |- | [[File:Skitty.png|40px]] Skitty || [[File:Delcatty.png|40px]] Delcatty |- | [[File:Munna.png|40px]] Munna || [[File:Musharna.png|40px]] Musharna |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
